name: Nuclear Lasagna
description:
A small game made for Ludum Dare 49. There is nothing past the 2 Neutronium upgrades.

Add heat to kick off the reaction. Click on upgrades to buy them. The reaction resets once heat reaches 100%.

Strange matter is consumed along with heat to produce antimatter.
Antimatter decays into heat. 
Heat is consumed to produce money.

The idea was to have a incremental game based on not hitting the cap of the main resource. You would have to buy upgrades to accelerate how fast you earned money while spending enough money to prevent it from going out of control.
